query:
UPDATE app.project_features
        SET status = COALESCE($1, status),
            is_primary = COALESCE($2, is_primary),
            name = COALESCE($3, name),
            last_updated = NOW(),
            last_updated_by = $4
        WHERE id= $5
        AND collection_id = $6
        AND project_id = $7
        RETURNING id, collection_id
